amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit funds in the bill from being used to conduct campaigns for the destruction of wild animals for the purpose of protecting stock.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 39 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit funding to be used to conduct campaigns for the destruction of wild animals for the purpose of protecting stock.

vote.text: On agreeing to the DeFazio amendment (A034) Failed by recorded vote: 190 - 228 (Roll no. 382).
